DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct North America . The aim trial investigate efficacy biphasic insulin aspart 30 subject type 2 diabetes achieve glycaemic target OADs ( oral anti-diabetic drug ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Failing OADs
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus least 12 month HbA1c 7.514.5 % ( inclusive ) screen Insulin na√Øve An antidiabetic regimen stable least 3 month prior screen An antidiabetic regimen include minimum 2 OADs Use insulin preparation within past 6 month Active proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require treatment within 6 month prior screen
